bibl.title: The Administration of Roman Egypt: A Survey of Recent Research and Some Outstanding Problems.
bibl.note: Confines himself to the first four centuries AD, and concentrates in particular on the civil administration.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II

bibl.seg: THOMAS J. David, The Administration of Roman Egypt: A Survey of Recent Research and Some Outstanding Problems.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 1245-1254.
Confines himself to the first four centuries AD, and concentrates in particular on the civil administration.
